name: PLAYHOUSE: Design Game
description:
Love art, design, and architecture? Then let your inner interior designer out to play in PLAYHOUSE: Design Game. Presenting the FIRST mobile interior design game that gives you the ultimate freedom to style your dream spaces how you see fit.

Create original room designs: Use new and innovative technology that gives you full control over where and how you place furniture and decor in your digital dream rooms. Design gorgeous gallery walls, create inviting seating arrangements, add 5 (or more!) plants...the design possibilities are endless!

Design with your favorite brands: Play with shoppable furniture and decor from brands you love, like 1stDibs, Tom Dixon, One Kings Lane, ABC Carpet & Home, Chairish, Lulu & Georgia, Jenni Kayne, Society6, Bloomscape, and so many more!

Sneak Peak: Explore your aesthetic and develop your skills with daily design projects:
* Travel to faraway lands in our Summer Travel Series!
* Learn how to combine different colors, styles, and eras!
* Transform a bland living room into the glam, boho, or contemporary retreat of your dreams. There are no (well, a few) rules in this house!

Shop your designs: See something you like? Shop furniture and decor from your favorite brands directly in the game. From PLAYHOUSE to your house!

Join our community: Compete for that perfect 5 *star* score and vote on fabulous looks from fellow designers. Get inspired and become an inspiration!

While you're here, join our IRL communities of like-minded design lovers:
IG: @comeplayhouse
TikTok:@comeplayhouse

Notes:
* Network connection is required to play.
* PLAYHOUSE: Design Game is free to download and play, however you are able to purchase in-app items using real money.
* Website: https://robingames.com/
* Privacy Policy: https://robingames.com/privacy-policy
